chara.textHome: Um, I'm Kako Natsume!
I really recommend you give it a read!
I'll read anything that looks interesting!
Yesterday I read a mystery novel.

It was called "Voldermann's
Flying Squirrel Murders"!
I really love books... I'm always reading!
Ah! Is this...reality? Uh, of course it is!

It felt like I'd gotten carried away
with too much reading...

But it really did feel like I went
in the book for a second there.

I'm so shocked...
I can't believe I can do things like this!
I think I might be on to something!
I'm writing a novel of my own, you know.

I'm still deep in the thick of it,
but I write a little each day.

Really though, reading and
writing are completely different things...

Listen! I finished writing it!
Yes, I finished my story!

It's only a short story, but I still
did it! It was really hard at the start,
but I breezed through the latter half.
I guess I just got into the zone?
I'm glad we were able to meet up again!

It's like I just found the bookmark so
we can carry on from where we left off!
Good morning...
Yes... I'm awake...
I'm sorry...
I'm not a morning person...
Zzz... Um...
Mind if I sleep a bit more?
I love this ramen shop!

Hmm, I think I'll have a large ramen with 
a boiled egg, keep the noodles firm, 
and only add a little oil!

Oh, and may I please have some 
green onions on top too?

I normally stop by the bookstore
near the station, but today I'm
going straight home...
What? That book goes on sale today?!

Ah, um...
Do you mind if we just take a look?
Huh?!
Oh!
I must have fallen asleep reading...
I should go to bed.

Oh, but... Is it all right 
if I just read a little more?
Hm, it's so hard to choose...
Which one should I buy?

Maybe this one?
But I want to read this one too...
Hm, all right, I've decided!
I'll get them all!
What will happen on the next page?

I always need to know,
so I never stop reading!
M-me? I don't know if I can do this...
No, that's not the right attitude!
If I'm doing it, I'm going to put my all into it!
Reading books teaches you lots of things.

Even if it doesn't teach
you something outright,

sometimes it can give you
hints or encourage you...
So I recommend reading!

I can forget about my
worries when I'm reading.

And finishing a book gives me 
the motivation to keep going!

When you read a book for the second time,
you notice things you didn't at first.
It's kind of like...

when leftover curry tastes
better on the second day.
Huh?
That doesn't sound quite right?

Look! It's a first edition of my favorite author,
Daihachiro Furuyashiki's debut novel,
'I Am You'.

I just had to have it.
It's one of my most prized possessions.

The smell of ink and paper
is so soothing to me.

I suppose it's because I've grown up
with the smell from a young age.

Some of my favorite words are 
"carefree", "ordinary", and "calm".

I'd be happy if more chaotic events
stayed stories in my books.
Why do Magical Girls exist?
Who was the first to become a Magical Girl?
I wonder...

There aren't any books about that,
are there?
Nanaka seems cool and mysterious,

like someone out of a spy novel, but I can
tell that she has a kind heart deep down...
Reading books in the bath is fun, isn't it?

But you need to be careful not to get too
carried away or you might end up like me...
I got dizzy and almost collapsed.

I've got to steel myself and
face them head on!
Phew. It looks like I won...
Looks like I managed to put an end to that…
To be continued, I would say!
Happily ever after!
Um...is it okay it's me?
Oh, yes! My name is Kako Natsume!
I'll do my best!
...At what?
Um, I mean...
I'll do my best, just in general!
I'm stronger now!
Though, um, only stronger for me I mean...

Um...do you think that maybe...
I'm in pretty good shape?
Well, I think I've gotten better...
But what do you think?

I'm a very careful reader,
so it takes me a while to finish a book.
I want to savor it as best I can...

When you get really lost in a book,
it's like you can peek at a completely
different world through the pages.
The way I imagine it, anyway.
